Inline XBRL Generator Java Interface
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator

Provides the classes to generate inline XBRL documents.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
InlineXBRLGeneratorErrorHandler An interface that defines methods for reporting errors found while generating inline XBRL documents.
InlineXBRLHeaderElementHandler A handler for controlling the destination of elements under the ix:header element of Inline XBRL.
 

Class Summary
ContinuationTagging Tagging information for the ix:continuation element to an XHTML node.
DefaultInlineXBRLHeaderElementHandler A default implementation class of InlineXBRLHeaderElementHandler.
FootnoteMapping A mapping between a footnote and XHTML nodes.
FormatType A format type for transforming numeric or date data.
InlineXBRLGenerator This class provides the functionality to generate Inline XBRL 1.0 documents.
InlineXBRLGenerator2 This class provides the functionality to generate Inline XBRL 1.1 documents.
InlineXBRLMapping A mapping between a fact or a footnote and XHTML nodes.
InlineXBRLTagging Tagging information for Inline XBRL elements to XHTML nodes.
NonFractionMapping A mapping between a numeric fact(except fraction item type) and XHTML nodes.
NonNumericMapping A mapping between a non-numeric fact and XHTML nodes.
 

Exception Summary
InlineXBRLGeneratorException This class provides error information found while generating inline XBRL documents.
 

Package com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator Description

Provides the classes to generate inline XBRL documents.

Please refer to this page for the sample program using this API.
